name: Sweet Treats
description: Fun and colorful candy themed match 3 game. Featuring 100 levels. Work your way up the ladder and become a mastery pastry chef.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.2 Ghz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 64MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 1.4 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Any
